law.text: The City of Raleigh Department of Transportation will redeem scrip for its full face value. taxicab companies may turn in scrip to the City once each month at a location and on a time schedule determined by the City's transportation director. A receipt will be issued for the scrip that is turned in, and within ten (10) working days a check for that amount will be issued to the taxicab company. (Ord. No. 1989-383, ยง5, 6-6-89)
